subject: Bug fixes
msgSnippet: Everyone: I am working with Kent and Erich to get some bug fixes into JUnit 3.8.2 (or 3.9, whichever). I would like to organize this effort now. If you have a
messageBody:
Everyone:

I am working with Kent and Erich to get some bug fixes into JUnit 3.8.2
(or 3.9, whichever). I would like to organize this effort now.

If you have a bug fix for JUnit 3.8.1, please contact me directly
offline at <junit at diasparsoftware dot com> and discuss both the bug
and the fix with me. For now, I will be the bottleneck for getting those
problems fixed in JUnit's "official" release.

I know it's not exactly Open Source, but I'm doing what I can.

Take care.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
